Text: I‚Äôm proud to be a cosponsor on several bills that invest in our public schools, including the EDUCATORS for America Act, Rebuild America‚Äôs Schools Act, and the ESP Family Leave Act.

This must end. 

I‚Äôm proud to introduce the Fair Calculations Act to outlaw disriminatory damage calculations in federal courts because all Americans deserve equal justice in our civil courts.

It is unacceptable that our courts award less in damages to women and people of color than white men in comparable civil cases.

In doing so, our courts are declaring that some Americans‚Äô lives are worth less based on lifetime earning potential statistics born of racism & sexism.

According to a study by @LawyersComm, courts often award women & people of color significantly less than white men in comparable civil cases.

Today, I introduced a bill to outlaw discriminatory damage calculations in federal courts & help make the legal system more just & equal.
Read our full release on the Digital Services Oversight and Safety Act (DSOSA) here! https://t.co/KoUAQL8fYV

Under this legislation, the new @FTC Bureau would issue and enforce comprehensive transparency and accessibility requirements, including: 

7/ https://t.co/58sMHMIUMc

The bureau within @FTC would employ at least 500 employees, including technologists, constitutional lawyers & experts like child development specialists and statisticians with the expertise needed to equip federal agencies and lawmakers with evidence-based research.

DSOSA changes that by creating the Bureau of Digital Services Oversight and Safety tasked with investigating systemic risks on online platforms and issuing transparency requirements and guidance on content neutral safety processes and design features. 5/

What‚Äôs become clearer than ever is that federal agencies and lawmakers lack the capacity necessary to truly understand these products‚Äô safety processes and design features, which limits their ability to create clear content-neutral ‚Äúseat belt‚Äù or ‚Äúspeed bump‚Äù regulations. 4/

While almost every other consumer product has safety standards, online platforms have evolved at warp speed with minimal federal oversight. 

The result has been rampant abuses that harm consumers and are often met with little to no consequences. 3/

In 2019, I questioned Zuckerberg on Facebook‚Äôs policies around vaccine misinformation & neonazi hate speech.

Thanks to whistleblowers like Francis Haugen, we now know that Facebook & other social media companies‚Äô promises to protect users‚Äô safety should NEVER have been trusted. https://t.co/Qr77lwUHSC
